content: get ready to crochet the coziest beanie with this easy-to-follow pattern perfect for crocheters of all skill levels this pattern includes sizes for babies toddlers teens and adults ensuring everyone in the family stays warm in style the half_double_crochet beanie pattern is worked in the round from the top down creating a seamless finish using lion brand s heartland yarn in aran weight this beanie is both soft and durable making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe whether you re making it for yourself or as a thoughtful gift this pattern is sure to become a staple in your crochet collection **unique features-** includes sizes for babies toddlers teens and adults worked in the round for a seamless finish clear written instructions and video tutorial available uses soft and durable lion brand heartland yarn in aran weight **materials needed-** \-yarn lion brand heartland aran weight - 75-105 yards hook us size 8 0 5 mm hook 5mm us size 8 0 gauges 14 stitches x 12 row = 4 inches in half_double_crochet 14 stitches by 12 row = 4 inches in half_double_crochet
